docs.lead_paragraph: Steve Downie scored twice after missing five games with the mumps, and the Pittsburgh Penguins used a three-goal, first-period lead to defeat the Tampa Bay Lightning 6-3 on Friday night.
docs.snippet: Steve Downie scored twice after missing five games with the mumps, and the Pittsburgh Penguins used a three-goal, first-period lead to defeat the Tampa Bay Lightning 6-3 on Friday night....

headline.main: Williams, Walker Lead No. 5 A&M Over Vanderbilt
headline.print_headline: Williams, Walker Lead No. 5 A&M Over Vanderbilt

docs.lead_paragraph: Courtney Williams had 22 points and Courtney Walker added 17 as No. 5 Texas A&M opened Southeastern Conference play with a 75-61 win over Vanderbilt on Friday night.
docs.snippet: Courtney Williams had 22 points and Courtney Walker added 17 as No. 5 Texas A&M opened Southeastern Conference play with a 75-61 win over Vanderbilt on Friday night....

headline.main: Staal, Malone Lead Hurricanes Past Flyers 2-1
headline.print_headline: Staal, Malone Lead Hurricanes Past Flyers 2-1

docs.lead_paragraph: Brad Malone scored his first goal of the season and Eric Staal got his 10th and the Carolina Hurricanes held on for a 2-1 victory over the Philadelphia Flyers on Friday night.
docs.snippet: Brad Malone scored his first goal of the season and Eric Staal got his 10th and the Carolina Hurricanes held on for a 2-1 victory over the Philadelphia Flyers on Friday night....

headline.main: Bournival Scores 2, Price Stops 22 in Canadiens' Win
headline.print_headline: Bournival Scores 2, Price Stops 22 in Canadiens' Win

docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Bournival scored his first two goals of the season and Carey Price made 22 saves on a personal milestone night and the Montreal Canadiens extended their winning streak to five with a 4-2 victory over the New Jersey Devils on Friday.
docs.snippet: Michael Bournival scored his first two goals of the season and Carey Price made 22 saves on a personal milestone night and the Montreal Canadiens extended their winning streak to five with a 4-2 victory over the New Jersey Devils on Friday....

headline.main: Love, Cavs Beat Hornets 91-87, Snap 3-Game Skid
headline.print_headline: Love, Cavs Beat Hornets 91-87, Snap 3-Game Skid

docs.lead_paragraph: Kevin Love scored 27 points, Kyrie Irving had 23 and the Cleveland Cavaliers snapped a three-game losing streak with a 91-87 win over the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night.
docs.snippet: Kevin Love scored 27 points, Kyrie Irving had 23 and the Cleveland Cavaliers snapped a three-game losing streak with a 91-87 win over the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night....

headline.main: Indonesian Search and Rescue Finds Two Large Objects in Hunt for AirAsia Jet
headline.print_headline: Indonesian Search and Rescue Finds Two Large Objects in Hunt for AirAsia Jet

docs.lead_paragraph: Indonesia search and rescue teams hunting for the wreck of an AirAsia passenger jet have located two "big objects" in the Java Sea, agency chief Fransiskus Bambang Soelistyo told reporters on Saturday.
docs.snippet: Indonesia search and rescue teams hunting for the wreck of an AirAsia passenger jet have located two "big objects" in the Java Sea, agency chief Fransiskus Bambang Soelistyo told reporters on Saturday....

headline.main: Federer Looks to Have Easy Start to 2015 in Brisbane Opener
headline.print_headline: Federer Looks to Have Easy Start to 2015 in Brisbane Opener

docs.lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, seeking an 18th Grand Slam title in his 18th season on tour, will ease into 2015 with a match against either a wild-card entry or a qualifier at the Brisbane International next week.
docs.snippet: Roger Federer, seeking an 18th Grand Slam title in his 18th season on tour, will ease into 2015 with a match against either a wild-card entry or a qualifier at the Brisbane International next week....

headline.main: Luongo Makes 30 Saves, Panthers Top Sabres 2-0
headline.print_headline: Luongo Makes 30 Saves, Panthers Top Sabres 2-0

docs.lead_paragraph: Roberto Luongo made 30 saves for his 68th career shutout to lead the Florida Panthers past the Buffalo Sabres 2-0 on Friday night.
docs.snippet: Roberto Luongo made 30 saves for his 68th career shutout to lead the Florida Panthers past the Buffalo Sabres 2-0 on Friday night....
